text: National Highway 328A, commonly referred to as NH 328A is a national highway in India. It is a secondary route of National Highway 28. NH-328A runs in the state of Uttar Pradesh in India. == Route == NH328A connects Mehdawal, Khalilabad, Ghanghata, Ramnagar and Nyori in the state of Uttar Pradesh. == Junctions == : Terminal near Mehdawal. : near Khalilabad : near Gagar Garh : Terminal near Nyori. == See also == * List of National Highways in India * List of National Highways in India by state == References == == External links == * NH 328A on OpenStreetMap Category:National highways in India Category:National Highways in Uttar Pradesh
title: National Highway 328A (India)
